title: 讀經班
decription: This certificate is issued by Cetiya Eka Satya Dharma (守忠佛堂) to formally recognize an individual's participation in an online classical scripture reading class. The class focused on the study of Kitab Klasik (Classical Texts), specifically the  百孝經 (bai Xiao Jing, or "Classic of Filial Piety")

title: HSK 2 Certification
decription: This certificate was issued by Hanban (汉办), the Chinese National Office for Teaching Chinese as a Foreign Language, to certify that the individual has successfully passed the HSK Level 2 exam, demonstrating proficiency in basic Chinese language skills.

title: 弟子规
decription: This certificate was issued by the Indonesian Alumni Association of Taiwan (印尼留台校友聯誼會) to recognize a student's participation in a cultural event held in Jakarta, Indonesia, on December 11, 2016.
